disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Iron Ambassador.

blurb.value: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage. The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

description.value: Innate: Poppy periodically throws her buckler as her next basic attack, gaining  350 bonus range and dealing 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. The buckler then falls near her target, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.

description2.value: When Poppy picks up the buckler, she shields herself for  15 / 17.5 / 20% (based on level) of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills its target, it bounces back to Poppy automatically. Enemy champions can step on the buckler to destroy it.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * PENDING FOR TEST: Iron Ambassador's interactions with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Hammer Shock.

blurb.value: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

description.value: Active: Poppy smashes the ground in front of her in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit. Against monsters, the damage based on their maximum health is capped.

leveling.value:
Initial Physical Damage:»40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 (+ 90% bonus AD) (+ 8% of target's maximum health)«Total Physical Damage:80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 180% bonus AD) (+ 16% of target's maximum health)
Maximum Initial Monster Damage:»90 / 140 / 190 / 240 / 290 (+ 90% bonus AD)«Maximum Monster Damage:180 / 280 / 380 / 480 / 580 (+ 180% bonus AD)

description2.value: The impacted ground becomes unstable, slowing enemies standing on it before erupting after 1 second, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies hit.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shields will block only a single instance of damage. Hammer Shock will cast from wherever Poppy is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Steadfast Presence.

blurb.value: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.

description.value: Passive: Poppy's  total armor and  total magic resistance are both increased by 10%, doubled to 20% when she falls  below 40% maximum health.

description2.value: Active: Poppy gains  40% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds and generates an aura around herself for the duration, causing all enemies who attempt to dash through it to be dealt magic damage, knocked up for 0.5 seconds, and afterwards both grounded and slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.

description3.value: Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Steadfast Presence does not stop dashes if the unit is crowd control immune, displacement immune, untargetable, or protected by spell shield in the process (e.g. Death Mark, Stormbringer, Unstoppable Force). Dashes when the unit is crowd control immune or unstoppable still trigger the aura and take the damage, but do not get knocked up and thus also never become grounded and slowed. Spell shields deny all the effects if Steadfast Presence is triggered by their holder, and are consumed in the process. Being untargetable prevents Steadfast Presence from triggering, but this does not prevent it from triggering against another, targetable dash. Steadfast Presence does not trigger against lunges.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Heroic Charge.

target range.value: 475

blurb.value: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

description.value: Active: Poppy dashes to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals them physical damage and carries them along with her for up to 300 units.

leveling.value: Initial Physical Damage:»60 / 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 (+ 50% bonus AD)«Total Physical Damage:120 / 160 / 200 / 240 / 280 (+ 100% bonus AD)

description2.value: If the target collides with terrain, she deals them the same physical damage again and stuns them.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Poppy will be ordered to basic attack the target. Heroic Charge applies spell effects twice (once when Poppy hits her target and once she stuns them against a wall). Heroic Charge interacts with impassable player-created terrain ( Crystallize, Emperor's Divide, Cataclysm, Pillar of Ice). The dash does not follow targets. The target's position at the time of Heroic Charge's cast is the direction Poppy will dash towards. Poppy does not carry nor deal damage to the target if they are not in range before she collides with them.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Keeper's Verdict.

width.value: 180

blurb.value: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

description.value: Active: Poppy charges for up to 4 seconds, slowing herself by 15% and increasing Keeper's Verdict's range and knock back distance over the duration. Keeper's Verdict can be recast at any time within its duration.

description2.value: Recast: Poppy smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, causing a hammer to erupt in the process. Enemies within the shockwave's path or struck by the hammer's eruption are dealt physical damage and knocked back a massive distance towards the enemy team's fountain.

description3.value: Releasing the ability within 0.5 seconds of the activation ends the charge to instead launch the hammer upwards, dealing 50% damage and knocking up all enemies around Poppy for 0.75 seconds.

description4.value: If Poppy is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is canceled and the ability is put on a 30-second  cooldown.

description5.value: Enemies knocked airborne are revealed and are rendered untargetable while being displaced if Poppy charged Keeper's Verdict for more than 0.5 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Enemies within the enemy team's fountain (at least 400 units away from the center of the fountain) that are hit by a Keeper's Verdict that would knock them back are instead knocked up for 0.75 seconds. They are not rendered untargetable. Keeper's Verdict does not destroy in-flight projectiles for enemies hit if they are rendered untargetable. The knock back will only displace enemies as far as they can go (e.g. to the furthest current spot available of Realm of Death's and The Hextech Ultimatum's borders and to the corner of the fountain). The displacement's duration will remain unchanged regardless of if the knock back cannot achieve its full distance due to the affected target being restricted by boundaries they are unable to cross. In order for this to be possible, the speed of the knock back is decreased (based on where the actual landing point is) to match the amount of distance covered to time spent displaced. Keeper's Verdict's airborne effect cannot be removed by cleansing effects. The following table refers for interactions while Poppy is channeling: Type Charge channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Allowed Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled N/A Interrupted by Teleport Recall Hexflash (Recasts) Interrupted by Death Silencing effects
